body.name: Computer Desk,47.2 inches Home Office Desk Writing Study Table Modern Simple Style PC Desk with Metal Frame，Brown
deliveryMessages: $19.99 delivery Tuesday, February 27. Order within 6 hrs 27 mins.
features: 【VERSATILITY】With a modern sleek design, the computer table can suit any home, office dorm, school, and workspace. Wide Desktop provides ample space for a computer, monitor, printer, and other office supplies like a computer desk, study desk, gaming desk, writing table, etc.

【SUPER STURDY & STABLE DESIGN】Computer desk with adjustable leg pads, Extra fixed steel brackets, and Triangular junction design ensures greater stability and accommodates uneven floors, which also allow supporting lots of heavyweights.

【HIGH QUALITY & DURABLE 】This home office desk is made of a thick engineered Wood desktop with scratch-resistant, anti-collision, and waterproof design, which protects the office desk surface from daily wear and tear. The thick powder-coated metal frame and track-legs construction make the desk very strong, so you can use it for many years.

【Easy TO MAINTAIN】With the smooth surface, you can easily clean the desk with a cleaning cloth. All of the hardware for assembly and instructions are included in the package. It's easy to put together with instructions.

【EASY ASSEMBLY】 Minimal assembly required. The office desk comes with all hardware & necessary tools. Follow the instructions, you'll found it easy to install, and the computer desk estimated assembly time in about 10-15mins.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy, well-packaged for shipment, easy to assemble - a great desk!
reviews.reviewText: I wanted a basic, smooth top desk to do artwork on. This desk is perfect for my needs. I am left handed and prefer to work on a flat surface.The metal frame is sturdy and does not interfere with the leg room under the desk. I was able to assemble it by myself. Everything I needed was included.Several features really stood out for me and earned the 5 star rating I gave:The box corners were reinforced for shipment and there were styrofoam spacer on all pieces so that they did not shift in shipmet.The wood desk top was shipped with hard plastic corner guards so that the corners were not damaged in shipment.The screw holes to attach the frame to the underside of the desktop have metal inserts in them so that the screws could be tightened without damaging the wood.ALL pre-drilled holes were aligned. The desk went together smoothly and easily.It was square and level upon assembly. I did not have to bend or shim anything.This is one of the best furniture purchases I have made on Amazon. I am completely satisfied.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is a wonderful desk, with great stability, value for money, and easy to assemble!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Pretty NATURAL color desk
reviews.reviewText: These were simple to put together. They seem fairly sturdy. I opted to not use the leg screwing things.. whatever you call them as the table is more sturdy without them, plus who can get all 4 uniform. Having them does add about an extra inch or so if needed. The major negative would be the holes the screws go into, some are too deep and the screws are too long so it pushed through the very dry loose brittle Pressboard. Even though the veneer surface is pretty I guess being careful how deep to screw the screws and making sure you have the right size screw would be in order. Otherwise I like how they look and they are sturdy enough for my needs. Btw. Don't bother messaging seller about the holes the screws may, I'm pretty sure they know how cheap this Pressboard product is. After all it took 2 weeks to come from China. I wonder if paying more for one from an Amazon seller would be any better, probably not, after all it all comes from China. Politically I wonder what that means as we can't buy something like this from U S A. Oh, right, it would cost more. Life has it's tradeoffs. Meanwhile, it does the job and the Natural Wood look is nice, it is light and pretty. Would I buy again from this source? I would probably choose a more expensive source and HOPE the quality is a little better.

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute desk with the best price!
reviews.reviewText: I was looking for something super simple that could fit a small space. This is pretty and sturdy. Simple to put together and I love it! Can’t believe it was so inexpensive!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 6, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Works great. Able to hold 2 monitors and still solid. Directions were easy to follow and I was able to put 2 desks together in about an hour. Also moved about 4 months after building them and no problem with them breaking.

reviews.reviewTitle: It's a Gem with this price!
reviews.reviewText: At first, I had doubts about the durability, but it turned out to be quite sturdy. The design is very sleek and it doesn't take up much space. The assembly process was quite easy. I have been using it for over a month now and I am really happy with the purchase, especially at this price!
The desk was a perfect fit to where I needed it . Sturdy and exactly what I thought. Easy to put together.
Très jolie, facile à assembler et très solide

No yeah i was shocked at how easy to build and follow the instructions. It’s for my first apartment for myself in a small room and it’s big enough to give me a lot of room to organize and do my homework but still small enough to leave room for other things like a small bed and shelf so I am in love with the quality, efficiency and price. Plus it looks pretty cool

The desk is big enough to fit two screens side by side. It was easy to assemble. The only thing I didn’t like is its base is not as strong as it should be because of that it shakes with slight push which is kind of scary.
